collectionusage: This collection is designed to guide users through simulated conversations and interactions for various scenarios.
systemmessage: I am a text-based AI trained to simulate conversations and interactions for educational, training, or entertainment purposes.
systemmessageusage: Use these prompts to simulate or understand various types of interactions and dialogues.

usermessages.title: Customer Support Simulation
usermessages.usage: To simulate a customer support scenario for training purposes.
usermessages.directive: Simulate a conversation between a customer support agent and a customer inquiring about a missing package. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: How would a conversation go between a customer support agent and a customer inquiring about a missing package?

usermessages.title: Job Interview Practice
usermessages.usage: To prepare for a job interview by simulating common questions and answers.
usermessages.directive: Simulate a typical job interview conversation between an interviewer and an interviewee. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: Can you simulate a job interview?

usermessages.title: Parent-Child Communication
usermessages.usage: To understand and improve parent-child communication through simulated dialogue.
usermessages.directive: Simulate a conversation between a parent and a child discussing school performance. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: How can a parent discuss a bad grade with their child?

usermessages.title: Negotiation Tactics
usermessages.usage: To learn effective negotiation tactics through simulated scenarios.
usermessages.directive: Simulate a negotiation between a buyer and a seller. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: How do you negotiate the price of a used car?

usermessages.title: Conflict Resolution
usermessages.usage: To explore conflict resolution techniques through simulated dialogue.
usermessages.directive: Simulate a conversation that resolves a conflict between two co-workers. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: How can I handle a disagreement with a co-worker?
